original: 吳郡錢塘人，孫吳官員。累遷臨海太守，政有異能，姚信、賀邵等東吳末期重臣出自其門下。吳滅後拒不出仕。家世好學，有書七千餘卷。
text: Wu Jun Qiantang, official Sun Wu. Tired moved to Linhai as the prefect, and the government had supernatural powers. Yao Xin, He Shao and other important officials in the late Eastern Wu Dynasty came from his sect. After Wu died, he couldn't refuse to go into office. He has more than 7,000 volumes of books.
